abstract: Orfeo ToolBox is an open-source project for state-of-the-art remote sensing, including a fast image viewer, applications callable from command-line, Python or QGIS, and a powerful C++ API. This article is an introduction to the Orfeo ToolBoxâ€™s flagship features from the point of view of the two communities it brings together: remote sensing and software engineering.
